org.kepler.workflowscheduler.gui

Class ScheduleChangeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kepler.workflowscheduler.gui.ScheduleChangeController

  • public class ScheduleChangeController
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller controls the relationship between schedule change and presentation(listener) change
    Author:
    tao

      • completeUploading

        public void completeUploading(java.lang.String KARFileLSID,
                              java.lang.String KARFilePath,
                              java.lang.String workflowName,
                              java.lang.String workflowLSID,
                              java.lang.String repositoryName)
        Call the method when the uploading is done. It will put the kar file lsid into a map. Then select the remote copy of the kar file to scheduler gui.
        Parameters:
        KARFileLSID - the lisd of the uploaded kar file
        KARFilePath - the path of the local kar file
        workflowName - the name of the workflow
        workflowLSID - the lsid of the workflow
        repositoryName - the name of the remote repository

      • showWarningMessageOnNoReporting

        public boolean showWarningMessageOnNoReporting()
        If the warning message will be shown if there is no reporting design on the workflow.
        Returns:
        true if the warning message will be shown. false otherwise.

      • setShowWarningMessageOnNoReporting

        public void setShowWarningMessageOnNoReporting(boolean showWarningMessageOnNoReporting)
        Set the controller showing the warning message or not if there is no reporting design on the workflow.
        Parameters:
        showWarningMessageOnNoReporting - true to show the warning message.
